module.exports = {"id":1282,"date":"2022-09-29T16:20:03","date_gmt":"2022-09-29T16:20:03","guid":{"rendered":"https://www.payleap.com/?page_id=1282"},"modified":"2022-10-10T14:54:57","modified_gmt":"2022-10-10T14:54:57","slug":"careers","status":"publish","type":"page","link":"https://www.payleap.com/careers/","title":{"rendered":"Careers"},"content":{"rendered":"

Careers

“PayLeap’s customer service was super helpful and professional, and I would recommend any business to try them.”

– Joe Haddad / universitees.com

Careers

Posted: Friday, 12th September 2014

Position:  Applications Developer (Atlanta)
 
Worksite:  Accullink Inc. 3225 Cumberland Blvd SE, Suite 550, Atlanta, GA 30339
 
Position available for Application Developer with the following qualifications:
 
Master’s degree in computer science, software engineering, or a related field and 5 years of progressive experience in position, Programmer, or related technical applications development position required.  Bachelor degree in computer science, software engineering, or a related technical field and 8 years of progressive application development experience acceptable in lieu of Masters + 5.  Experience must include 4 years of experience in Microsoft .NET framework, C# and ASP.NET coding; 2 years of object oriented design skills, advanced Microsoft patterns and practices, SQL Server application development, database design skills; 2 years of Dependency Injection Frameworks and Task Parallel Library.
 
Job duties for this position include:
 
Applications Developer (Atlanta) – Analyze users’ needs; design, test, and develop software to meet needs; recommend software upgrades for customers’ programs and systems; design each piece of the application or system; plan how the pieces will work together; create models and diagrams to instruct programmers to write software code; ensure software continues to function through software maintenance and testing; document every aspect of the application or system as a reference for future maintenance and upgrades; collaborate with other computer specialists to create optimum software.
 
If interested in this position, or if you know of qualified persons who might be interested, please email John Chandy at jchandy@acculynk.com.
